sec.p: We are grateful to Jeffrey Peters for facilitating the molecular analysis of samples. We thank David Nkosi for his assistance with fieldwork and Mercedes Grome for her assistance with the molecular analysis of samples. We are also grateful to Professor Maureen Coetzee for her assistance with the identification of mosquito species. The manuscript was improved by comments from S. Bensch and R.V.M. Sehgal. This work was funded by grants from the DST/NRF Centre of Excellence at the Percy FitzPatrick Institute of African Ornithology and the International Foundation for Science (IFS).
